snippet: Thousands of volunteers and runners dedicated their Sunday to helping families whose houses were damaged or destroyed by Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: Thousands of marathon volunteers and runners, who had planned to participate in New York City Marathon, dedicate canceled race day to helping families whose houses were damaged or destroyed by Hurricane Sandy.

byline.original: By JULIET MACUR and STEVE EDER

lead_paragraph: Thousands of volunteers and runners dedicated their Sunday to helping families whose houses were damaged or destroyed by Hurricane Sandy.

headline.seo: Marathoners Embrace Chance to Help New Yorkers Recover From Storm
headline.main: Runners Embrace Chance to Help Residents Recover
headline.print_headline: ...Pitching In: Runners Embrace a Chance to Help Residents Recover
